name: Night Shift
summary: The player controls a gas station cashier taking the night shift. The game mostly consists of the player doing menial tasks assigned to them in a note from their manager, like sweeping the floor, reorganizing the stock, and checking out customers. However, a foreboding atmosphere is set when a mysterious white van laps around the gas station and the player has to check out an extremely creepy, tall and suspicious customer with afro hair. After he leaves, they hear a door open in the back and investigate where they're attacked by the Night Shift Abductor.
